(Advertiser) Uncover your deepest desires Characteristics Welcome! We all have different needs we need to supply. This is an app to help you more easily fulfill them with the people already around you that you might not have considered could help you, or that you could help. Please indicate what you can supply, and what you need help with, below.
If you need a level supplied, tap the checkbox on the left.
If you can supply a level's need, tap the checkbox on the right. The information below will serve to identify you in a crowd. Don't overthink your answers, just answer so that someone can visually identify you quickly. Answer in order, as the questions change based on the first answer. If an answer is "yes", check the box. If it is "no", leave the box unchecked." Now send it out to the world and wait for someone to approach you!
(they should be using the receiver app)
If you make a change to your information after you had started advertising, stop and start advertising."> About this app

We hope this app reminds you of the magic that is already out there in the world. As you use it, we invite you to allow yourself to: 
- Receive help from someone you may not have considered that could enrich your life. 
- See your life in many more dimensions than just survival and pleasure. 
- Fulfill different needs than the ones you have already covered (i.e. don't continuously fulfill the same one/s). 
- Be clear about your deeper desires instead of being pushed by expectations. 
- Blur the lines between giving and receiving help, which may help discover a deeper reality than the apparent separation we experience. In other words, be open to what you might receive when you feel you are giving, and open yourself to noticing the flavor your life takes when you feel grateful for the help you receive. 
Enjoy!
